attributes.action: To officially recognize St Georges day as a national bank holiday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that England should have the opportunity to celebrate what is great about this country. I know there is a plan to create a british day and I'm in favour of that too, However Scotland and Northern Ireland already have more bank holidays than we do and we're all governed by the same people so this would be a good chance for a bit of equilibrium!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
